author: Richard Del Conte
text:
I am looking for a free solution to a software problem, if anyone has suggestions it would be greatly appreciated.
I need software to do pdf documents that will be type fill enabled and have the ability to be saved by our customers.  In addition I’d like to be able to produce interactive flowcharts. These flowcharts would have hyperlinks and instructional video to help explain our permitting process.  I know that Adobe Acrobat can handle these items so I’m looking for free comparable software that would meet licensing and security issues of an IT department.
Thank you in advance for your help.
title: Need a free solution to a software problem?
